rdf:Description.rdf:value: The identifiers provided by re3data.org (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Auto-Value Example: r3d100010134

rdf:Description.rdf:value: A unique string to identify the RDR metadata entry. The internal identifier is assigned by re3data.org.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Auto-Value Example: http://doi.org/10.17616/R3X S37

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The DOI assigned to the re3data.org metadata entry of the RDR to make the metadata entries citable.

rdf:Description.skos:note: The format is open. Example: Access to Archival Databases

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The full name of the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: The format is open. Example: AAD

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The alternative name or acronym for the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: URL Example: http://cdiac.esd.ornl.gov/ho me.html

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The URL of the RDR.
An identifier provisioned for the website of the RDR (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: DOI

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The type of the provider of the identifier for the RDR (e.g. DOI, URN, VIAF, DataCite).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: http://doi.org/10.1234/foo

rdf:Description.rdf:value: A globally unique identifier that refers to the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: The format is open (max. 2.000 characters).

rdf:Description.rdf:value: A textual description providing additional information about the RDR (primary language is English).

rdf:Description.skos:note: The format is open. Example: info@researchdata.com

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The email address of the contact or an URL of an online contact form of the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: disciplinary governmental institutional multidisciplinary project-related other

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The type of the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: The format is open. Example: 5.000 datasets; 30 studies

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The number of items contained in the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD or any other format described in W3C-DTF (ISO-8601)

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The date of the last update of the RDR size.

rdf:Description.skos:note: YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD or any other format described in W3C-DTF (ISO-8601)

rdf:Description.rdf:value: Releasing date of the RDR.
The RDR ended its service of ingesting new research data and/or providing it (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD or any other format described in W3C-DTF (ISO-8601) or empty value with attribute xsi:nil set to "true"

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The date when the RDR stopped ingesting new research data to its database. The database and its research data are still available.

rdf:Description.skos:note: YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD or any other format described in W3C-DTF (ISO-8601) or empty value with attribute xsi:nil set to "true"

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The date when the RDR went offline. The database and/or the website are no longer available.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values from: ISO-639-3. Examples: eng, deu, fra

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The user interface language of the RDR.
The disciplinary focus of the RDR (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values from: DFG Classification of Subject Area

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The subject scheme according to which the subject of the RDR is described.

rdf:Description.skos:note: The format is dependent on scheme. Examples: 11 10101

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The ID/notation of the subject classification.

rdf:Description.skos:note: The format is dependent on scheme. Examples: Humanities Prehistory

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The subject(s) of the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: URL Example: http://cdiac.ornl.gov/aboutc diac.html

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The URL of a mission statement describing the designated community of the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: The format is dependent on scheme. Examples: Raw data, Images

rdf:Description.rdf:value: All types of resources available in the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values from: PARSE.Insight survey

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The name and/or URL of the subject scheme or classification code.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: dataProvider serviceProvider

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The type of provider.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Examples: computer science

rdf:Description.rdf:value: English keyword(s) describing the subject focus of the RDR.
All institutions being responsible for funding, creating and/or running the RDR (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: National Institute of General Medical Sciences, U.S. National Institutes of Health

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The name of the responsible institution.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: NIGMS

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The alternative name or acronym for the responsible institution.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed Values from: ISO-3166-1 alpha-3. Examples: DEU, GBR, USA

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The location of the responsible institution.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: funding general main sponsoring technical

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The type of responsibility for each responsible institution.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: commercial non-profit

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The type of responsible institution.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: http://www.nigms.nih.gov/

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The URL of the responsible institution.
The identifier for the responsible institution (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: ISNI

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The provider name of the identifier for the responsible institution (e.g. ISNI, VIAF, FundRef, DataCite).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: http://isni.org/isni/00000001 00755874

rdf:Description.rdf:value: A globally unique identifier that refers to the institution.

rdf:Description.skos:note: YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD or any other format described in W3C-DTF (ISO-8601)

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The start date of the period of responsibility.

rdf:Description.skos:note: YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD or any other format described in W3C-DTF (ISO-8601)

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The end date of the period of responsibility.

rdf:Description.skos:note: The format is open. Example: john.doe@researchdata.com

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The email address of the contact or an URL of an online contact form of the institution.
Policies providing information concerning the usage of the RDR (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values from: Access policy Collection policy Data policy Metadata policy Preservation policy Submission policy Terms of use Usage policy Quality policy

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The type of the policy.

rdf:Description.skos:note: The format is open. Example: Data policy of the information system PANGAEA

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The name of the policy.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: http://www.pangaea.de/cura tor/files/pangaea-data- policy.pdf

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The URL of the policy.
The access regulation to the RDR (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: open embargoed restricted closed

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The type of access to the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: feeRequired registration other

rdf:Description.rdf:value: All existing access restrictions to the RDR (required if restricted is chosen).
The database license of the RDR (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The name of the database license.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/by/4.0/

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The database license URL.
The access regulation to the research data provided by the RDR (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: open restricted closed

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The type of access to research data.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: feeRequired institutional membership registration other

rdf:Description.rdf:value: All existing access restrictions to the research data (required if restricted is chosen).
The license of the research data, existing in the RDR (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The name of the data license.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/by/4.0/

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The data license URL.
The regulation for submitting research data to the RDR (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: open restricted closed

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The type of the data upload.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: feeRequired institutional membership registration other

rdf:Description.rdf:value: All existing restrictions to the data upload (required if restricted is chosen).
The license for data upload (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example:

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The name of the data

rdf:Description.skos:note: URL Example: http://cbil.upenn.edu/RAD/p hp/RAD-data_sub.php

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The data upload license URL.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: DSpace

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The name of the software that is used to run the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: yes no unknown

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The RDR supports versioning of research data.
The API supported by the RDR (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: OAI-PMH

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The type of the API.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: http://www.datadryad.org/o ai/

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The URL of the API.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: http://wiki.datadryad.org/Da ta_Access#OAI-PMH

rdf:Description.rdf:value: A link referring to the API documentation, a website that states its availability and other information for using the API.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: DOI

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The persistent identifier system that is used by the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: Data Citation Index SCOPUS

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The RDR is covered by SCOPUS or the Data Citation Index.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: Altmetric; usage statistics

rdf:Description.rdf:value: Any service, tool, etc. that is used by the RDR to track, measure and visualize the usage of provided research data.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: http://wiki.pangaea.de/wiki/ Citation

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The URL of the RDR providing information on how to cite its research data. The DataCite citation format is recommended (http://www.datacite.or g/whycitedata).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: ORCID

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The author identifier system that is used by the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: yes no unknown

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The RDR offers the interlinking between publications and data.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Controlled vocabulary Allowed values: yes no unknown

rdf:Description.rdf:value: Any form of quality management concerning the research data or metadata of the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: Data Seal of Approval (DSA), ISO 16919

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The certificate, seal or standard the RDR complies with.
The metadata standard the RDR complies with (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: Data Documentation Initiative (DDI )

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The name of the metadata standard.

rdf:Description.skos:note: URL Example: http://www.ddialliance.org/S pecification/

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The URL of the metadata standard.
The alerting service the RDR offers (wrapper element).

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: RSS

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The type of the alerting service.

rdf:Description.skos:note: Example: http://datacentrum.3tu.nl/e n/information/rss/

rdf:Description.rdf:value: URL of the alerting service(s) provided by the RDR.

rdf:Description.skos:note: The format is open.

rdf:Description.rdf:value: Additional remarks

rdf:Description.skos:note: YYYY-MM-DD (ISO-8601)

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The date the RDR was indexed in re3data.org.

rdf:Description.skos:note: YYYY-MM-DD (ISO-8601)

rdf:Description.rdf:value: The date the metadata of the RDR was updated.
